subject: Good Day,
body:
Good Day,
I will be interested in a Joint Investment opportunity within or
outside your area. I look forward to reading from you soon for further
discussion.
Regards,
Mohamed Mansour.
CEO Mansour Group
Email: 
myaffairss8888@gmail.com

subject: Re: Good Day,
body:
Hello Mohamed Mansour,

Good day to you too! I'm quite intrigued by your proposal for a joint investment. Could you please provide more details about this opportunity? What kind of investment are we talking about and what would be my role in it?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Nicole
